title: Exception thrown when exporting data from table containing highlight/map
description:
Description: An exception is thrown when trying to export data from the attached report.
Steps to reproduce:
1. Add a table to the report that contains a group, a highlight rule, and a map rule in the group row.
2. Preview the attached report.
3. Attempt to export the data.
OB: When trying to export data from a table that contains a group, a highlight rule, and a map rule in the group row, an exception is thrown.
EB: When exporting data from a table that contains a group, a highlight rule, and a map rule in the group row, the export should be successful without any exceptions.
SR:
1. Create a table in the report that contains a group, a highlight rule, and a map rule in the group row.
2. Preview the report.
3. Try to export the data from the table.
